Contributing
============

Contributions to ``CIMAP`` are more than welcome. The muscular activation pattern can be interpreted in many ways and we are open to discuss for improvement and how to add/remove features.

Instructions for contributors
-----------------------------

* Report any bugs, suggestions or unexpected behaviour to the `GitHub Issue tracker <https://github.com/Biolab-PoliTO/CIMAP/issues>`_.
* Please follow the `python style guide <https://peps.python.org/pep-0008/>`_.
* Follow the `Numpy convention <https://numpydoc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/format.html>`_ for docstrings. These are automatically converted into web documentation using `Sphinx <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/extensions/napoleon.html>`_.
* Make your code in a separate branch on GitHub and create a `merge request <https://docs.github.com/en/desktop/contributing-and-collaborating-using-github-desktop/keeping-your-local-repository-in-sync-with-github/syncing-your-branch>`_ when you think its ready to be added.
* Where possible, add tests to make sure your code works as expected and continues to work as expected.
